title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Pharmacy Act 2007 (Special measures
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Pharmacy Act 2007 (Special measures 

registration having regard to Covid-19) (No. 2) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited pharmacy act 2007 (special measure registration regard covid-19) (no 2) order 2021

title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No.
heading: 2. The 30th day of June 2022 is specified as the different date for the
text_raw:
2. The 30th day of June 2022 is specified as the different date for the 

purposes of section 77(6) of the Pharmacy Act 2007. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 December, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 14th December, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [683] 3
text_norm: 2 30th day june 2022 specified different date purpose section 77(6) pharmacy act 2007 given official seal 8 december 2021 stephen donnelly minister health notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 14th december 2021 683 3

title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This order specifies 30 June 2022 as the date on which a Section 77 registration 
still in force shall cease to have effect. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [683]
